item.title: FIRST ever script in SCAR
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

Good job for a first script, but just personally try to make it into an autotalker :). If you need any references this is my auto-talker. Please do not leech code just use it to get a feeling for the code you need.

[code]
{.Script Info:

ScriptName = Auto-Talker

Author = Hey321

Description = Auto-Talks for ya for specified times

Version = 6.0

Date = Thursday, November, 9TH, 3: 30: 41 PM

Comments = Good script

/Script Info}
program MessageWriter;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

const
Message1=(’::money’);
WaitTime=1000;
NumLoops=100;

var
MessagesTyped: Integer;

procedure login;
begin
NumberOfPlayers(1);
Players[0].name := (‘t3h0n30wn4g3’);
Players[0].pass := (‘heyhey’);

if(not loggedin)then
loginplayer
end;

Procedure DoRandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
end;

procedure MessageSender;
begin
ActivateClient;
TypeSend(Message1+chr(13));
Sleep(1)
MessagesTyped:=MessagesTyped+1;
end;

procedure TimeToWait;
begin
wait (waittime + random (250));
end;

procedure ProgressReport;
begin
Writeln(’[]—////////////////////\\\\\\\—[]’);
Writeln(’ Thanks for using Hey321s’);
Writeln(’ Auto-Talker ‘);
Writeln(’ Worked for:’ +ScriptTime2(2));
Writeln(’ Sentences typed: ‘+IntToStr(MessagesTyped)+’’);
Writeln(’[]—////////////////////\\\\\\\—[]’);
end;

begin
ClearDebug;
SetupSRL;
login
repeat
MessageSender;
DoRandoms;
TimeToWait;
DoRandoms;
ProgressReport;
until(MessagesTyped = NumLoops);
wait(WaitTime + random (50));
DoRandoms;
end.[/code]

XD Big script i know but its very good.

Read full topic

item.title: FIRST ever script in SCAR
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

Please be leniant, I started learning scar an hour ago, And this is the first thing i have ever written, Yes i know I should put the wait thing in, But i wanted it to say it as fast as possible. Anything wrong with it? or should be added tell me

[scar]program script;

const
Message1=‘OI CUNT YES YOU, YOUR A FUCKING CUNT YEAH FUCK YOU, CUNT’; //What he says he he he Insta ban

procedure OI;
begin
Writeln(Message1);
end;

begin
repeat
OI;
until(false)
end;
[/scar]

Read full topic
